attributes.action: ban the wearing of veils etc in airports,seaports,banks,and law courts for the safety of all concerned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the wearing of veils etc in airports,seaports,banks,and law courts for the safety of all concerned."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11407.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/security/
